text: After over 4 months of closure, 'non-essential' shops like #hairdressers, #gyms & outside seating in pubs reopen in #England today, due to success in #COVID19 vaccination in UK with 32 mn doses of #vaccine given covering 47% population.#MIG #English #coronavirus #PubsReopening https://t.co/cf3qLsE6iG
